synonyms.synonym: Sodium channel protein cardiac muscle subunit alpha
Sodium channel protein type V subunit alpha
Voltage-gated sodium channel subunit alpha Nav1.5

protein.specific_function: This protein mediates the voltage-dependent sodium ion permeability of excitable membranes. Assuming opened or closed conformations in response to the voltage difference across the membrane, the protein forms a sodium-selective channel through which Na(+) ions may pass in accordance with their electrochemical gradient. It is a tetrodotoxin-resistant Na(+) channel isoform. This channel is responsible for the initial upstroke of the action potential in the electrocardiogram
